dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Your workspace is ready. Let's get started.

hero.subtitle: A production-ready template for building cross-platform web and mobile applications. Start building features, not boilerplate.

waitlist.success: You're on the list! We'll be in touch soon.
waitlist.disclaimer: Be among the first to get access. No spam, ever.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build and ship your app

auth.title: Authentication
auth.description: Email/password and OAuth authentication with Better Auth. Includes email verification and password reset.

database.title: Database
database.description: PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM. Type-safe queries with auto-generated Zod validators.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Web and mobile from a single codebase with 80%+ code sharing using React Native and Next.js.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: PostHog integration for product analytics, feature flags, and session recording.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: RevenueCat integration for subscription management across web and mobile.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Novu for in-app inbox and Expo Push for mobile notifications.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you

intro.paragraph1: This is a cross-platform boilerplate for building production-ready web and mobile applications.
intro.paragraph2: It includes authentication, database, analytics, subscriptions, and more so you can focus on building features.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Web and mobile from a single codebase with 80%+ code sharing

productionReady.title: Production-Ready
productionReady.description: Auth, database, analytics, and more already configured

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join the waitlist and be among the first to get access.

footer.tagline: Building the future, one feature at a time.

createAdmin.title: Create Admin User
createAdmin.subtitle: Invite a new team member to the admin portal
createAdmin.name: Name
createAdmin.roleDescription: Select the level of access for this admin
createAdmin.roleReadOnlyDesc: Can view data but cannot make changes
createAdmin.roleSupportRWDesc: Can view and modify data, handle support
createAdmin.roleSuperAdminDesc: Full access including managing other admins
createAdmin.successMessage: An email has been sent to {{email}} with instructions to complete setup.
createAdmin.userExists: A user with this email already exists
